title: Complementary Currencies
description: A schema to map, track and compare complementary currency projects.

accounting_tech.title: Accounting software type
accounting_tech.description: N.B. The accounting software may differ from the user interface
enumNames: Integrated with the App. (what's the best name for this)

movement.title: Movement
movement.description: Does the project identify as part of a wider movement?
enumNames: Something else (we may contact you about it)

convert_to_legal_money.title: Conversion to legal tender
convert_to_legal_money.description: Whether and how the currency can be exchanged for money
enumNames: None / unofficial only e.g LETS, timebanks, other non-monetary systems.
Market based e.g. via currency markets.
Legal money is 100% held in a reserve E.g Bristol Pound
Redeemable from a fractional reserve, perhaps using a bonding curve e.g. Grassroots Economics.

cost_recovery.title: Cost recovery
cost_recovery.description: How does the project cover its running costs? (multiple choice)

enumNames: Savings tax / Demurrage fee / negative interest

launch_year.title: Launch Year
launch_year.description: The year that the entity was instantiated.

legal_form.title: Organisation type
legal_form.description: (typology borrowed from at standards.esd.org.uk - voluntary and charity sector)

monetary_model.title: Monetary model
monetary_model.description: The basis of issuance and redemption
enumNames: Fixed number of tokens e.g. Bitcoin
Tokens issued as needed e.g. Time banks, reputation scores
Mutual credit e.g. Sardex, Wir, business barter, LETS
Self-issued credit e.g. shopping vouchers, deli dollars, self-signed cheques

num_transactions_year.title: Number of transactions annually
num_transactions_year.description: The number of transactions registered in the last 12 months, not including usage fees

num_users_year.title: Active users annually
num_users_year.description: The number of users who have traded / logged in within the last 12 months.

payment_tech.title: Payments / user interface
payment_tech.description: How do users make payments and view their accounts? (multiple choice)

enumNames: Each member keeps an account book.

unit_of_account_type.title: Type of unit of account
unit_of_account_type.description: How is the value of the currency unit determined?
enumNames: Equivalent to national legal unit e.g. US dollar.
Indexed to a commodity price or basket e.g. gold, eggs
Redeemable for a commodity e.g. vouchers
Other e.g. Most LETS create arbitary units
